mapper.insert: insert into PILL (PILLNAME, CAPACITY, COMPANY, PRICE) value (#{PILLNAME}, #{CAPACITY}, #{COMPANY}, #{PRICE})
mapper.update: update PILL set PILLNAME=#{PILLNAME}, CAPACITY=#{CAPACITY}, COMPANY=#{COMPANY}, PRICE=#{PRICE} where PILLCODE = #{PILLCODE}
update PRODUCT inner join PILL on PRODUCT.PILLCODE = PILL.PILLCODE set PNAME=(select PILLNAME from PILL where PILLCODE = #{PILLCODE})
